rtai_fpu.h

00029 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_FPU_H
00030 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_FPU_H
00031 
00032 #ifndef __cplusplus
00033 #include <asm/processor.h>
00034 #endif /* !__cplusplus */
00035
00036 typedef union i387_union FPU_ENV;
00037
00038 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_FPU_SUPPORT
00039 
00040 #define init_fpu(tsk) \
00041         do { init_xfpu(); tsk->used_math = 1; set_tsk_used_fpu(tsk); } while(0)
00042 
00043 #define restore_fpu(tsk) \
00044         do { restore_fpenv_lxrt((tsk)); set_tsk_used_fpu(tsk); } while (0)
00045 
00046 #define load_mxcsr(val) \
00047         do { \
00048                 unsigned long __mxcsr = ((unsigned long)(val) & 0xffbf); \
00049                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("ldmxcsr %0": : "m" (__mxcsr)); \
00050         } while (0)
00051 
00052 #define save_cr0_and_clts(x) \
00053         do { \
00054                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("movl %%cr0,%0; clts": "=r" (x)); \
00055         } while (0)
00056 
00057 #define restore_cr0(x) \
00058         do { \
00059                 if (x & 8) { \
00060                        unsigned long flags; \
00061                        rtai_hw_save_flags_and_cli(flags); \
00062                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("movl %%cr0, %0": "=r" (x)); \
00063                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("movl %0, %%cr0": :"r" (8 | x)); \
00064                        rtai_hw_restore_flags(flags); \
00065                 } \
00066         } while (0)
00067 
00068 #define enable_fpu() \
00069         do { \
00070                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("clts"); \
00071         } while (0)
00072 
00073 #define init_xfpu() \
00074         do { \
00075                 __asm__ __volatile__ ("clts; fninit"); \
00076                 if (cpu_has_xmm) { \
00077                         load_mxcsr(0x1f80); \
00078                 } \
00079         } while (0)
00080 
00081 #define save_fpenv(x) \
00082         do { \
00083                 if (cpu_has_fxsr) { \
00084                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("fxsave %0; fnclex": "=m" (x)); \
00085                 } else { \
00086                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("fnsave %0; fwait": "=m" (x)); \
00087                 } \
00088         } while (0)
00089 
00090 #define restore_fpenv(x) \
00091         do { \
00092                 if (cpu_has_fxsr) { \
00093                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("fxrstor %0": : "m" (x)); \
00094                 } else { \
00095                         __asm__ __volatile__ ("frstor %0": : "m" (x)); \
00096                 } \
00097         } while (0)
00098 
00099 #define restore_task_fpenv(t) \
00100         do { \
00101                clts(); \
00102                restore_fpenv((t)->thread.i387.fsave); \
00103         } while (0)
00104 
00105 #define restore_fpenv_lxrt(t) restore_task_fpenv(t)
00106 
00107 #else /* !CONFIG_RTAI_FPU_SUPPORT */
00108
00109 static void init_fpu(struct task_struct *tsk) { }
00110 #define restore_fpu(tsk)
00111 #define save_cr0_and_clts(x)
00112 #define restore_cr0(x)
00113 #define enable_fpu()
00114 #define load_mxcsr(val)
00115 #define init_xfpu()
00116 #define save_fpenv(x)
00117 #define restore_fpenv(x)
00118 #define restore_task_fpenv(t)
00119 #define restore_fpenv_lxrt(t)
00120 
00121 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_FPU_SUPPORT */
00122
00123 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_I386_FPU_H */
